name: Military Special Warrior
description:
Military Special Warrior is a complete war game which features a real army military mission that you never felt in other commando shooting games. There are multiple levels in this game which are definitely full of thrill and excitement. The control of game is very smooth and easy. Play like a secret agent and sniper shooter, you will forget all other shooting games.
In this Military Special Warrior Join the battlefield as an army special trained commando. Enemy soldiers are everywhere and their mission is to kill you and hold your base camp Fight against your enemy’s as well-trained commando and survive in this war.

Military Special Warrior: Features

First Person Shooting (FPS).
Different type of sniper guns
Real army battlefield environment.
Easy and user-friendly Interface.
